title: Like Veneer but not distressed
content: Looking for a font similar to Veneer, a tall, vintage sans serif with rounded corners, but without the distressed look.
author: Billy Lyons Designs

comments.content:
To me, Veneer and [Alternate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/alternate+gothic)/ [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic) Condensed Bold (no.20) share the same design backbone.  
Alternatives:  
- Rounded: [Trade Gothic Next Soft Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic-next-soft-rounded), [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/garage-gothic) (/R off), [Brauer Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Brauer+Neue) (/R off), [Ultramagnetic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0020), [Vinyl](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/vinyl), [Colaba](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.hypefortype.com/colaba.html), [Cst Berlin East](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-cst-berlin-east)  
- Not rounded: [Verb](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/verb) (same foundry), [Benton Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/benton-sans), [Griffith Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/griffith-gothic), [Pennsylvania](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/pennsylvania) (/R off), [Stacker](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wordshape/stacker), [CA Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/capearcona/ca-normal), [Langdon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.stevenbonner.com/projects/langdon), [Komu B](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dizajndesign/komu), [Cst Berlin West](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307181156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/cst-berlin-west)
